Hi all, this is my first offer at LET.  Hopefully I've got this close to right.  

Unless you modify it in the ordering process, your #3.99/mo KVM VPS with come equipped as:


* 2 x vCPU (expandable to 6)
* 512 MB Ram (expandable to 2 GB)
* a single IPv4 IP address (not NAT, expandable to 61 usable)
* 5GB of boot disk (expandable to 20 GB)
* 5mbps of unmetered bandwidth (expandable to 100)
* CentOS pre-installed (if desired)


Additional OS images are available in your server control panel. The images are netinstall .iso files that you can use to install Debian, Ubuntu, CentOS, FreeBSD... or if you have your own OS distro that you'd like to use just ask and I can upload an image for you.

I'm not a big fan of pre-packaged deals.  The ordering process is very flexible so you can add and remove features where you find value.

Datacenter is in Kelowna, BC, Canada.  I've been getting very good bandwidth to the US and quite reasonable bandwidth to Asia.

Skype username is davinoverland.  If you have questions that you don't want to ask here, feel free to ask there.

Not sure what else to say.  If I've missed something, please let me know.


Click below to order:

[https://billing.availanet.com/cart.php?a=confproduct&i=0](https://billing.availanet.com/cart.php?a=confproduct&i=0)
